businesses.name: Roots Southern Table
businesses.description: Roots Southern Table pays homage to the way Chef Tiffany Derry grew up eating in the South. The restaurant emphasizes field-to-table eating, reflecting a lifestyle of eating with the seasons, canning, and preserving fresh-picked fruits and vegetables. Signature dishes include Duck-Fat Fried Chicken, Texas Red Fish, and My Mother's Gumbo.
businesses.location: 13050 Bee Street, Suite 160, Farmers Branch, TX 75234
businesses.hours: Tuesday to Sunday, 5:00 PM â€“ 10:00 PM
